original_title: Canadian national arrested with cocaine and Hashish at BIA
original_body_lines: A 52-year-old Canadian national has been arrested by Sri Lanka Customs officials at the Bandaranaike International Airport (BIA) in Katunayake while attempting to smuggle 05 kg of cocaine and 12 kg of Hashish into the country.
The street value of the seized narcotics is estimated at around Rs. 400 million in total.
